hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Diagno AI is an innovative platform providing medical diagnostics and doctor recommendations powered by artificial intelligence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: The primary goal of the Diagno AI platform is to expand access to quality medical care and make healthcare services universally accessible using artificial intelligence technologies.
mission.description2: We aim to improve communication between doctors and patients, accelerate the diagnostic process, and enhance the healthcare system by providing remote medical services.

checklist.item3: Improving communication between doctors and patients

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The Diagno AI platform is built on the following core values

value1.title: Reliability and Security
value1.description: User data security and privacy are our top priorities. All data is encrypted and stored in compliance with medical standards.

value2.title: Quality and Accuracy
value2.description: Our AI algorithms are continuously improved and updated with the latest medical data. We strive for the highest level of accuracy.

value3.title: Speed and Convenience
value3.description: We provide users with fast and convenient access to medical care anytime, anywhere. 24/7 service is our core principle.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The experienced professionals behind the Diagno AI platform

member1.name: Dr. Alisher Karimov
member1.description: Cardiologist with 20 years of experience. Developed the idea and core concept of the Diagno AI platform.

member2.name: Dilnoza Rahimova
member2.description: Expert in artificial intelligence and medical data analysis. MIT graduate.

member3.name: Dr. Bobur Toshmatov
member3.description: Therapist and public health expert. Collaborated with the World Health Organization.

member4.name: Malika Usmonova
member4.description: Specialist with 8 years of experience in medical software and user experience.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At DiagnoAI, we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.body: We may collect personal information such as your name, email, health inputs, uploaded files, and location data to provide accurate AI diagnosis and doctor recommendations.

use.title: How We Use Your Data
use.item2: To connect you with relevant medical specialists.
use.item3: To improve our platform and AI models.

security.title: Data Security
security.body: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.

accept.title: Acceptance of Terms
accept.body: By using DiagnoAI, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you must stop using our services.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: Our AI provides informational support only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult a licensed doctor for medical concerns.

responsibility.title: User Responsibilities
responsibility.item2: Do not misuse or attempt to harm our platform.
responsibility.item3: Respect local laws and regulations when using our services.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.body: DiagnoAI is not liable for any damages, misdiagnoses, or consequences arising from reliance on our AI or platform.

q1.question: Is DiagnoAI a doctor?
q1.answer: No. DiagnoAI is an AI-powered assistant that supports medical insights. It does not replace professional medical advice.

q2.question: How accurate are the results?
q2.answer: Our AI is trained on a wide range of medical data, but accuracy depends on the quality of input. Always confirm with a doctor.

q3.question: Is my data safe?
q3.answer: Yes. We use encryption and industry-standard practices to keep your information secure.

q4.question: Can I get a refund?
q4.answer: Refunds are available only under certain conditions. Please contact our support team for details.

q5.question: Do I need an account to use DiagnoAI?
q5.answer: Yes, an account is required to track your AI interactions, uploaded files, and doctor recommendations.
